acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to manufacture POJOs which contain immutable collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToManufacturePojosWhichContainImmutableCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableDefaultFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the List<?> [key, ZLNUwIbv6G, wsUuqYePx2, tjm3SKJE8G, wPAmW4Ymxo] should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
Then the List should have exactly 5 elements
Then the Map<?, ?> {9voeX0WP2d=-63629079, rHVdzbNk_h=-1118584559, tQTZ7IE_6K=-2007842944, AXYuScKc8m=850679644, ETg07eeuAA=-1608733878} should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly 5 elements
